body: Bruh her sword working like Soft Machine

Jack you can suck my fucking dick with your limp ass princess link profile picture

@SuccmeB0ss: Gracias por la aclaración, ahora entiendo porqué muchas veces hay como 5 traducciones diferentes para cada manga. I love how it is drawn, let's see if it ends and we can see the full story.

For all those wondering why this comic gets re-uploaded a lot:

It is a work in progress manga that gets updated by the artist on their social media. When an update is made, someone updates the comic on SadPanda and deletes the old gallery there.

Because Nhentai works by mirroring all SadPanda galleries, and also does not delete any old galleries when they are updated, you see this comic re-uploaded a lot when a new page is added. Nhentai does not delete the old galleries.

It's a problem with Nhentai's system more than anything else.

Does anyone have any clues as of why this comicbook get reuploaded every fucking week? Even the translations.

I don't hate it nor the artist, i just wanna know who's behind this and why.

I wouldnt say they are a trash artist but i do agree on 1 thing. Rather see this uploaded like every 3-5 new chapters instead of every little update. You could also just blacklist the artist if angers and annoys you so much lol.
i never agreed that much with someone in my life before
I logged in just to comment that this artist is shit and Im tired of seeing him all the fucking time. Seriously, quit uploading this trash.
